tasks.title: Idea Generation Workshop
tasks.description: Facilitate a workshop with the project team, stakeholders, and partners to generate a wide range of ideas and potential solutions. Encourage creativity and collaboration to come up with innovative approaches. Capture and document all the ideas generated during the workshop.

tasks.title: Idea Evaluation and Selection
tasks.description: Review and evaluate the ideas generated in the previous workshop. Assess their feasibility, alignment with project goals, and potential impact. Select the most promising ideas for further development and refinement.

tasks.title: Prototype Development
tasks.description: Based on the selected ideas, create prototypes or mock-ups of the proposed solutions. Iterate on the designs and gather feedback from stakeholders and users throughout the development process.
